short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Seek Youtube or KissAnime videos like Prime videos. Seek video forward/back with specified time, when you hover the video

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Seek video back and forth by 10 second, when you hover the video on Youtube or KissAnime. This extension displays icons over the video for seeking. Instead of finding next seek in progress bar, you can seek it by 10 second by clicking on one place only.
